website_summaries.verdict: Contains a natural form of vitamin E in each capsule.
pros: Each capsule contains 250 IU of vitamin E from food sources, which is better absorbed
Also contains fat-soluble vitamins A, D, K, and selenium
cons: More expensive than many other brands

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the time to share. This vitamin is amazing. Since my 4 year old son was born, the anxiety of being a mother caused insomnia. I've tried everything possible and nothing worked. Then I tried this product. Heaven on Earth, final sleep started coming back to my eyes, DEEP SLEEP too. I never had that problem again. Thanks vitamin code for giving me my life back. Oh and I started smiling again ***
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL FOR NAILS
customer_reviews.text: After a bone marrow transplant my nails were in a terrible state. I was losing some and the rest were so brittle from the heavy doses of chemo. I mentioned it to my oncologist and much to my surprise he suggested I take vitamin E. I chose Garden of Life as it was raw and a good brand. After 6 weeks there is a big difference in my nails. I would recommend it for splitting, peeling, weak nails.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamin E pills I know
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought over the years different brands of vitamin E: Costco / Kirkland, Target’s Simply Balanced, etc. But this one is the best. It’s really high quality. It’s the best I was able to find on the market after a lot of comparison. I’ve been taking it for about a month and interestingly enough, the biggest improvement I’ve noticed is my vision. I am nearsighted (myopia) but I had been getting major blurry vision and headaches recently but now the blurry vision and headaches are gone since I started taking it.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: I take it and it is fine. It is hard to know if a vitamin ...
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to rate vitamins. I do check out the vitamins I buy through consumerlab.com. And this one is rated OK. I take it and it is fine. It is hard to know if a vitamin is doing anything to improve your health.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Vitamin Code products for a couple of years now and find them beneficial to me and my diet. They are tasteless, and are easy to swallow. The E Code has several other vitamins in it that I'd normally purchase separately but don't have to because they are all wrapped up in this one capsule. I love their products!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Banner

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin!!!
customer_reviews.text: From spouse of account holder I am into my second bottle of this product. I have lots of positive results in this vitamin. All of the ingredients are working for me. Pretty inside working on the outside. Nails hair and skin. I take all of my supplements before bedtime. No unusual side effects. VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER WITH A SUBSCRPTION ON THE WAY. THANK YOU!!!

customer_reviews.title: I also just feel better in general while using it--sleep
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed my hair is thicker and healthier since using this supplement. I also just feel better in general while using it--sleep, energy levels, and immune system have all be mildly improved. Unlike other supplements containing vitamin D, I don't experience stomach upset when taking this one.

customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good quality E vitamin. I like all the ingredients it has. The only thing its not an oil as I thought E is oil soluble, but I take it with my Salmon oil so I hope that helps.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed "Esclerovitan E". Unable to find this vitamin in the US, I found Vitamin Code E. I guess I won't know for sure if this is a good product or not until I take it for a few months but I gave it 5 stars for being the only one with the right amount of A, E and D plus Selenium. I tried Vitamin Code Women before and those where so huge they made me gag a few times, but the vitamin E capsules are not that big. Also, you can take both capsules once a day which is great to avoid forgetting to take one of them.

customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read the description better. This is NOT liquid vitamin E! I thought it was. They are dry capsules. They don't have a taste to them. But the ingredients meet pretty high standards. I haven't been taking them long enough to comment on the quality yet.

customer_reviews.title: My Skin Cleared Up - This Works for Acne!
customer_reviews.text: It is the Selenium that worked in clearing up my cystic, chronic acne. I have tried taking the other vitamins by themselves before, but this blend with selenium actually worked. I started taking it two months ago and it cleared up in about a week or two (can't remember exactly, but it cleared up fast when compared to how long I've been suffering with this- over 20 years). I am a 35 year old woman and I finally have clear skin. Now I have to worry about these horrible scars...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Causes cystic acne and hair loss!!!
customer_reviews.text: Causes cystic acne and hair loss. After much time trying to figure out what the issue was, and taking a break from other vitamins, THIS vitamin (as well as the healthy blood iron supplement of the same company) is the culprit and this brand is horrible. Stay away!!!!!! I have scars from cystic acne all over my face suffering for a year and a half wondering why all of a sudden my skin was having issues; I thought it was stress or anxiety after losing my job, but it was only after I stopped taking this damn company's vitamin that my face started clearing up. They should be SUED.
customer_reviews.author: talster

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin

I do strenuous physical work outs and I think this brand of E prevents muscular aches and enhances my recovery and muscle tone.

My only dislike with this product is that I assumed (yes I know what that makes me lol) that it was a small liquid/gel capsule and it is most definitely not! It is a larger capsule that is powder, not liquid. I can't take them because they upset my stomach so hubby is finishing up the bottle lol Oh well!

I also plan on buying the one a day version from this brand.

customer_reviews.text: I don't like that this product includes 100% of the RDA of selenium, but doesn't say so in the name. Selenium is not something anyone should take in excess, so I didn't want this in my vitamin E.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Vitamin E - Vitamin Code Raw Vitamin E Supplement with Vitamins A, D & K Plus Selenium, Fruit, Veggies & Probiotics, 60 Vegetarian Capsules, 125mg Whole Food Vitamin E for Heart Health
product_meta.description: As a powerful antioxidant, vitamin E assists the body in fighting oxidative stress and supports a healthy cardiovascular system. It is known for its free radical scavenging properties, helping your immune system to fight against the effects of free radicals. Determined to attack cell life in your body, free radicals may contribute to the weakening of the immune system.
feature_bullets: Vitamin E with Selenium: Our vitamin E capsules provide whole food Vitamin E from Sunflower Oil with naturally occurring mixed tocopherols, along with fat-soluble Vitamins A, D & K plus Selenium
Supporting Antioxidants: Our E vitamin contains 23 organically grown fruits and vegetables, which add supporting antioxidants, vitamins and nutrient cofactors
Breast & Prostate Health: This RAW, food created Vitamin E supplement aids in heart health, immune system support, digestive support, eye health and breast & prostate health
Probiotics & Enzymes: Our plant based E vitamin includes a RAW Probiotic and Enzyme blend for digestive support, plus a fruit & vegetable blend for additional nutritional support
Our whole food multivitamin is RAW, Non-GMO, Gluten Free and Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
